message.p:
If there is a QR-code in the image, you can try cropping the photo or adjusting color level.
Using a 3rd party app/website, or the capabilities built into iOS or Android, will also often times work better.

messages.message: {1} of the QR-codes had invalid URIs.
The QR-code did not contain a interspec:// or raddata:// URI.
Would you like to use all of these?

Would you like to use the QR-code starting with
{1}...
ত্রুটি retrieving data to embed - not embedding image.
না foreground loaded - not embedding image.
Image has been embedded in the foreground spectrum file; only exporting in N42-2012 file format will preserve this.
This file looks to be an image, and not a spectrum file.
Uploaded file was too large to try and display.

Images are automatically searched for QR-codes that may be useable by InterSpec.
If there is a QR-code in the image that is not found, you may have better luck using a 3rd party app/website, or the capabilities built into iOS or Android.
If you use a 3rd part tool to extract the URI from the QR-code, you can enter it into InterSpec using the "Enter URL" item in the "Edit" menu.
